channel.title: Discipline on Life At The Circus

item.title: A No Thank You Bite
item.description: [] (https://latc.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/06/w4mewed1.jpg) "Ew, gross!" "I don’t like it!" How many of you have had this response after working hard to prepare a new dish for you family? It can be quite frustrating especially if you know they’ll like it b/c they like every single one of the ingredients in it or worse yet, they devoured it the last time you made it and now won’t even try it. My husband and I have always insisted the our kids at least try a bite of whatever it is we’re eating.

item.title: Busted!
